name: Culinary Delights
short_description: Savor every moment with our Culinary Delights wedding service. From gourmet feasts to delightful desserts, we turn your wedding into a flavorful celebration you'll cherish forever.

name: Floral Enchantment
short_description: Transform your wedding into a blooming paradise with our Floral Enchantment service. We craft enchanting floral arrangements that add a touch of natural beauty and romance to your special day.

name: Couture candles & Lighting
short_description: Elevate your wedding ambiance with our Couture Candles & Lighting. We create enchanting atmospheres, radiating romance and elegance through carefully curated lighting and exquisite candle decor.

name: Serenade Strings
short_description: Enchant your wedding with Serenade Strings. Our live musical ensembles weave melodies that will make your special day truly unforgettable

name: Glamuar & Glow
short_description: Elevate your bridal beauty with Glamour & Glow. Our expert stylists ensure you radiate elegance and confidence on your wedding day.

name: Wedding Whispers
short_description: Capture the essence of your love story with Wedding Whispers. Personalized vows and officiation services for an unforgettable ceremony.
